Articles.Content:
I would like a mod(mods) that would be able to simulate how people REALLY finally got to space.

IE I start by sending gliders off cliffs,the fly planes,then build rockets.

You might be interested in BTSM Better Than Starting Manned.

It does not add gliders but among other things it rearranges the tech tree so you'll have to develop probes before you can launch crewed capsules.
